ygData.subject: Re: Stamina and HP's
ygData.msgSnippet: Agnostic Trolls and Ogres are still KOS in the Human cities as far as I know.  Stamina, much like str doesn t really kick in until after level 20, BUT compare
ygData.messageBody:
Agnostic Trolls and Ogres are still KOS in the Human cities as far as I
know. Stamina, much like str doesn't really kick in until after level 20,
BUT compare your hp to an equal level human or DE, you will have ALOT more
the higher you go.

> ----------
> From: RiLeonard@...[SMTP:RiLeonard@...]
> Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Sent: Thursday, May 27, 1999 9:04 AM
> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Subject: [warriors_eq] Staminia and HP's
>
> From: RiLeonard@...
>
> I would like to get responses on what is your Sta. and HP's per lvl as a
> warrior and what race you chose.
>
> I am a Ogre Sta. 142 and get 31 to 33 HP's a lvl
>
> I am thinking about going to the next new server and starting over but ill
>
> test alot of the warrior race/stats out to see what will give the best
> benefit.
>
> Also if you go Agnostic as a Troll or Oger how hard is it to get into
> Good
> Citys / Areas.
>
> Grimspear 16th lvl warrior on Taraw ma
